title: Tennis Channel's Solomon: Will Reach 60 Million Homes (Audio)
itunes:title: Tennis Channel's Solomon: Will Reach 60 Million Homes (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Ken Solomon, CEO and Chairman of The Tennis Channel, recaps the US Open, and how the Tennis Channel could reach 60 million homes by 2017. Live from the 2016 US Tennis Open in Flushing, Queens NY.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
